languages.text: "...который ты громишь с одержимостью разъяренного грокса! Что ж, когда ты окажешься в моих руках, я и поступлю с тобой как с гроксом — подвешу тебя крючьями за ребра и буду отрезать по куску за каждую пробоину в "Бессердечном".
languages.translation_comment: Если набрали все три этюда на урон по кораблю
Если набрали все три этюда на урон по кораблю

languages.text: "...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."
languages.original_text: "...который ты громишь с одержимостью разъяренного грокса! Что ж, когда ты окажешься в моих руках, я и поступлю с тобой как с гроксом — подвешу тебя крючьями за ребра и буду отрезать по куску за каждую пробоину в "Бессердечном".

traits.locale_text: "...and thrashing it with the nerve of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

"...and thrashing it with the nerve of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

"...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

"...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

"...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

"...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

languages.text: «... ¡y destrozándola con las ganas de un grox enfurecido! Quizá, para ser justos, debería tratarte igual que a un grox en cuanto te tenga: clavaré ganchos entre tus costillas, te colgaré y cortaré un filetito por cada grieta que me hayas abierto en la Desalmada».
languages.original_text: "...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

traits.locale_text: «... ¡y destrozándola con las ganas de un grox enfurecido! Quizá, para ser justos, debería tratarte igual que a un grox en cuanto te tenga: clavaré ganchos entre tus costillas, te colgaré y cortaré un filetito por cada grieta que me hayas abierto en la Desalmada».

languages.text: “……还像一群没脑子的格洛克斯兽，把我的船搞得乱七八糟！等我把你捆起来之后，我要像收拾格洛克斯兽一样收拾你。我要把你的肋骨串在钩子上，你每弄坏我船上一个东西，我就从你身上割下一块肉来。”
languages.original_text: "...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

traits.locale_text: “……还像一群没脑子的格洛克斯兽，把我的船搞得乱七八糟！等我把你捆起来之后，我要像收拾格洛克斯兽一样收拾你。我要把你的肋骨串在钩子上，你每弄坏我船上一个东西，我就从你身上割下一块肉来。”

languages.text: « ... et que vous le saccagez avec la délicatesse d'un grox enragé ! Ma foi, quand je vous mettrai le grappin dessus, peut-être que je devrais vous traiter comme l'immonde bestiau que vous êtes, en vous pendant par des crochets avant de vous arracher une livre de chair pour chacune des avaries infligées au Sans-Cœur. »
languages.original_text: "...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

traits.locale_text: « ... et que vous le saccagez avec la délicatesse d'un grox enragé ! Ma foi, quand je vous mettrai le grappin dessus, peut-être que je devrais vous traiter comme l'immonde bestiau que vous êtes, en vous pendant par des crochets avant de vous arracher une livre de chair pour chacune des avaries infligées au Sans-Cœur. »

languages.text: 「荒れ狂うグロックスで大打撃を与えている！よし、私がお前を痛い目に遭わせるとき、グロックスのように扱うべきかもしれない―お前を吊るして、お前がハートレスで行ったすべての違反ごとにお前を切り分けててやる」
languages.original_text: "...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

traits.locale_text: 「荒れ狂うグロックスで大打撃を与えている！よし、私がお前を痛い目に遭わせるとき、グロックスのように扱うべきかもしれない―お前を吊るして、お前がハートレスで行ったすべての違反ごとにお前を切り分けててやる」

languages.text: "Kızışmış grokslar gibi her yeri işaretliyorsunuz! Öyle olsun, sizi elime geçirdiğimde groks muamelesi yapacağım. Kaburga kemiklerinizden sallandırıp Taşkalp'teki her bir ihlaliniz için çeşitli yerlerinizi keseceğim."
languages.original_text: "...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

traits.locale_text: "Kızışmış grokslar gibi her yeri işaretliyorsunuz! Öyle olsun, sizi elime geçirdiğimde groks muamelesi yapacağım. Kaburga kemiklerinizden sallandırıp Taşkalp'teki her bir ihlaliniz için çeşitli yerlerinizi keseceğim."

languages.text: "... und zerstört es mit der Begeisterung eines rasenden Grox! Tja, dann sollte ich Euch wohl auch behandeln wie Grox, falls ich Euch in die Finger bekomme ... ich werde Euch an Haken in Eurer Brust aufhängen und Euch für jede Schramme, die Ihr der Heartless zugefügt habt, ein Stück Fleisch aus dem Leib schneiden."
languages.original_text: "...and thrashing it with the gusto of a raging grox! Well then, when I get my hands on you, perhaps I should treat you like a grox — I will hang you from hooks between your ribs and cut off a piece of you for every breach you have made in the Heartless."

traits.locale_text: "... und zerstört es mit der Begeisterung eines rasenden Grox! Tja, dann sollte ich Euch wohl auch behandeln wie Grox, falls ich Euch in die Finger bekomme ... ich werde Euch an Haken in Eurer Brust aufhängen und Euch für jede Schramme, die Ihr der Heartless zugefügt habt, ein Stück Fleisch aus dem Leib schneiden."
